title: What are data unit tests and why we need them
description:
Speaker:: Theodore Meynard

Track: PyData: Data Handling
I will introduce the concept of data unit tests and why they are important in the workflow of data scientists when building data products. In this talk, you will learn a new tool you can use to ensure the quality of the products you build.


Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022 conference, April 11-13 2022.
https://2022.pycon.de
More details at the conference page: https://2022.pycon.de/program/MPWLWP
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
